name: SaCpper - Console Minesweeper in Cpp
tagline: Port of classic built-in Windows Game - Minesweeper
body:
# SaCpper - console Minesweeper in Cpp


Watch your step! Minesweeper is back!
 
***
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MarcinJozwik/SaCpper---console-Minesweeper-in-Cpp/master/screenshot.jpg)

***
## About:
SaCpper is an console application in Cpp, which is a port of classic built-in Windows Game Minesweeper.
Since ancient times Minesweeper has been a integral part of Windows environment, so everybody knows the rules of this game, main objective and structure. My version is trying to be as similar as possible to the original one. With better or worse effects ;)

***
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MarcinJozwik/SaCpper---console-Minesweeper-in-Cpp/master/screenshot.png)

***
### Features:

- Game taking place on dynamic two-dimensional array of structures
- Colourful game board in console with diffrent colours of numbers around mines 
- Three levels of difficulty and custom mode 
- Flexible structure - you can adjust every detail - length and width of board, number of mines etc.
- Implemented simple system sounds to make game even more attractive
- High Scores table for every level

Have fun!

***
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MarcinJozwik/SaCpper---console-Minesweeper-in-Cpp/master/screenshot1.png)

***

Author: Marcin Jozwik 2015
